fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Exactly one Legendary and at least one Base or Single will always spawn. Only one Single may spawn.
- Evolved cannot spawn naturally; they must be transformed into from Base.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill until the Legendary dies

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone that opposes the Pokemon.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Kill anyone that opposes the Pokemon.
